alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued March 03 at 4:34PM EST until March 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield and Southern New Haven Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester, Bronx, Northwest Suffolk, Northern Queens and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread flooding of vulnerable areas is expected near the waterfront and shoreline, including roads, parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront. Numerous road closures are likely, and vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront will likely become flooded. Flooding will also extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 2 to 4 feet along open east and northeast facing shorelines will result in beach erosion, with wave splashover over dunes and bulkheads exacerbating flooding of shoreline roads and properties. Localized minor damage to shoreline structures is possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/10 PM 8.2/ 8.7 0.4/ 0.9 2.2/ 2.7 1-3 NONE 04/09 AM 11.0/11.5 3.2/ 3.7 4.0/ 4.5 3-5 MODERATE 04/10 PM 7.7/ 8.2 -0.2/ 0.3 1.2/ 1.7 1-2 NONE 05/10 AM 8.9/ 9.4 1.1/ 1.6 1.9/ 2.3 1 NONE 05/10 PM 7.5/ 8.0 -0.3/ 0.2 0.6/ 1.1 1 NONE 06/11 AM 7.5/ 8.0 -0.3/ 0.2 0.2/ 0.8 1 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
